DOC.brief_summary: This study design explore safety tolerability investigational pneumococcal vaccine step-down enrollment . Primary Objective : - To evaluate safety tolerability investigational pneumococcal vaccine . Secondary Objective : - To evaluate immunogenicity investigational pneumococcal vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigational Pneumococcal Vaccine Healthy Adults , Toddlers Infants
DOC.detailed_description: All adult participant receive single injection study vaccine placebo . After satisfactory safety evaluation , toddler participant receive single injection study vaccine placebo . After satisfactory safety evaluation , infant participant receive 3 injection study vaccine placebo dose-ascending order ( low , medium , high dose ) , safety evaluation dose level study proceeds next high dose . All participant undergo immunogenicity test monitoring safety .
